project(devkit_shared)

include(../../cmake/Macros.cmake)

#---AUTO_GEN_PARSE<CMAKE_SHARED_DEV_KIT_SOURCES>---
# Code below autogenerated, see xbmc/addons/kodi-dev-kit/tools/code-generator.py
set(SOURCES
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ShareProcess.cpp
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ShareProcessReceiver.cpp
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ShareProcessTransmitter.cpp
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/SharedMemControl.cpp
  $<$<STREQUAL:${CORE_SYSTEM_NAME},linux>:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/SharedMemControlPosixMMAP.cpp>
  $<$<STREQUAL:${CORE_SYSTEM_NAME},freebsd>:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/SharedMemControlPosixMMAP.cpp>
  $<$<STREQUAL:${CORE_SYSTEM_NAME},android>:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/SharedMemControlPosixMMAP.cpp>
  $<$<STREQUAL:${CORE_SYSTEM_NAME},osx>:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/SharedMemControlPosixMMAP.cpp>
  $<$<STREQUAL:${CORE_SYSTEM_NAME},darwin_embedded>:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/SharedMemControlPosixMMAP.cpp>
)
#---AUTO_GEN_PARSE<CMAKE_SHARED_DEV_KIT_SOURCES_END>---

#---AUTO_GEN_PARSE<CMAKE_SHARED_DEV_KIT_HEADERS>---

#---AUTO_GEN_PARSE<CMAKE_SHARED_DEV_KIT_HEADERS_END>---

# target_sources(devkit_shared INTERFACE ${SOURCES}
#                                        ${HEADERS})
add_library(devkit_shared OBJECT ${SOURCES}
                                 ${HEADERS})
set_target_properties(devkit_shared PROPERTIES C_VISIBILITY_PRESET hidden
                                         CXX_VISIBILITY_PRESET hidden
                                         VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN ON
                                         POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
